books.name: The Streaming Wars
books.description: Cartman locks horns with his mum in a battle of wills while an epic conflict unfolds and threatens South Park's very existence.
books.author: Eric Cartman

books.name: Token's Life Matters
books.description: The boys discovery of a prehistoric relic allows Barbara Streisand to transform into a monster that threatens to destroy South Park and the world.
books.author: Kenny McCormick

books.name: Shelley's Secret Baby
books.description: South Park citizens declare a "Conjoined Twin Myslexia Awareness Week" to help the school nurse. The school's dodgeball team goes to the championships with Pip as their star player.
books.author: Shelley Marsh
